attributes.action: Allow Chester Zoo to reopen to visitors now.
attributes.additional_details: Chester Zoo is a huge outdoor site and has implemented all the necessary safety measures to protect visitors.  Chester Zoo also plays a vital role in the future of our world and for the future of humanity, in its mission to prevent extinction.  It is not only an amazing visitor experience but is critical to conservation.  Chester Zoo is a charity and relies on visitors to continue its work. It must be allowed to reopen and continue its essential role.
attributes.background:
Chester Zoo has been closed to visitors since late March due to the pandemic.
In recent weeks, as the lockdown is eased, the government have allowed parks, gardens, beaches, schools and shops to reopen whilst maintaining Covid secure procedures.
Chester Zoo must also be allowed to reopen.
